select notice_seq.nextval from dual
insert into notice (notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, category_no, customer_no) values (#{no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{categoryNo}, #{customerNo})
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title = #{title}, notice_content = #{content}, notice_updated_date = sysdate, notice_deleted = #{isDeleted}, category_no = #{categoryNo} where notice_no = #{no}
mapper.select: select * from notice where NOTICE_DELETED = 'N' order by notice_created_date

select count(*) from notice
NOTICE_DELETED = 'N'
and notice_title like '%' || #{value} || '%'
and notice_content like '%' || #{value} || '%'
select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_filename as image from notice_image where notice_no = #{value}
select category_no as categoryNo, category_name as name from notice_category
